name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior Software Engineer with over 10 years of experience in developing scalable backend systems, proficient in **C#**, **.Net Core**, and cloud technologies including **AWS** and **Azure**. Demonstrated expertise in Test-Driven Development (**TDD**), Behavior-Driven Development (**BDD**), and continuous delivery principles to ensure high-quality deliverables. Skilled in designing and implementing effective solutions utilizing relational and non-relational databases, alongside strong foundations in algorithms and data structures. Original strengths include creating high-performing APIs and automation tools, as well as crafting cloud-native architectures for financial platforms and AI/ML pipelines, with proven contributions at leading organizations such as VISA, Sii Poland, and Reply Polska.
